channel.title: Recent Version of Kicksecure Slow Network Performance
channel.description:
Hello, I've been a big supporter of both Kicksecure and Whonix for many years and noticed that the latest version of Kicksecure with kernel 5.10.XX has noticeably slower network performance compared to older versions.
I've tested with Virtualbox and KVM (forward mode bridged & nat).
Has anything changed about the system, in terms of configs, settings or packages relating to networking, that could have caused this?
Regards
